type DocumentDesigner = class inherit ScrollableControlDesigner interface IRootDesigner interface IDesigner interface IDisposable interface IToolboxUser

summary.span: 針對支援巢狀控制項並應該接收捲動訊息的 ，可用於擴充其設計模式行為，並提供其根層級設計模式檢視的基底設計工具類別。

span.span: Base designer class for extending the design mode behavior of, and providing a root-level design mode view for, a that supports nested controls and should receive scroll messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個設計工具為根目錄設計工具，這表示，它會提供根層級設計模式檢視相關聯的文件檢視在設計模式中時。This designer is a root designer, meaning that it provides the root-level design mode view for the associated document when it is viewed in design mode. 您可將設計工具關聯型別使用。You can associate a designer with a type using a . 如需自訂設計階段行為的概觀，請參閱[擴充設計階段支援](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2)。For an overview of customizing design time behavior, see [Extending Design-Time Support](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。在覆寫小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 [實作 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需有關和，請參閱 [清理 Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 上和 [覆寫 Finalize 方法] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

summary.span: 指示設計工具是否支援指定的工具。

span.span: Indicates whether the specified tool is supported by the designer.

returns.span: 如果應在工具箱上啟用工具，則為 ；如果文件設計工具不知道如何使用工具，則為 。

span.span: if the tool should be enabled on the toolbox; if the document designer doesn't know how to use the tool.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果支援的工具，將會啟用在 [工具箱] 設計工具取得焦點時。If a tool is supported, it will be enabled in the toolbox when the designer receives focus. 否則，它將會停用。Otherwise, it will be disabled. 一旦標記的工具為啟用或停用它沒有查詢一次。Once a tool is marked as enabled or disabled it can not be queried again.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者按兩下工具箱項目上呼叫。 is called when the user double-clicks on a toolbox item. 文件設計工具應該建立指定的工具元件。The document designer should create a component for the specified tool. 在 [工具箱] 中啟用的工具將會傳遞至這個方法。Only tools that are enabled in the toolbox will be passed to this method.
